Entries.default: A bridge of wound rope crosses the gap, planks of dark wood supported between the strands.
[Cross the bridge.]
[Examine the bridge.]
[Carefully cross the bridge.]
[Reinforce the bridge.]
[Reinforce the bridge with magic.]
[Search for another route.]

The thick rope has been well-anchored - each line wrapped and tightly tied around one of a pair of heavy stones. The knots have long-since crusted over solid - there's no untying them. 

The sun has bleached the wooden planks to a dull gray.

The edges of the wood seem somewhat splintered rather than cleanly cut. It seems no attempt was made to seal the planks.

The rope seems of stronger make, but could stand to be reinforced.

You rest your hand upon the damp loam and call to the life within. Vines sprout forth, wrapping around the rope and wood alike, spreading across the bridge until the span looks as if it grew naturally from the jungle.
[Specified 0] rests a hand upon the damp loam. Moments later, vines sprout forth, wrapping around the rope and wood alike and spreading across the bridge until it looks a natural part of the jungle.

Words of power on your lips, you perform a few arcane gestures before resting your hands just above the braided supports. Thick webbing manifests from your palms, woven from the potent essence, and spreads across the bridge, shoring up the planks and rope.
Chanting words of power, [Specified 0] rests both hands just above the braided supports. Thick webbing spreads across the bridge, shoring up the planks and rope.

You've been working with your hands for longer than you've been reading souls, and you immediately recognize the wood as a material well past reliability. Its discoloration and ragged edges prove obvious signs of rot.
Each piece of wood examined looks like the kind one would avoid trying to sneak over.
The wood looks good for burning but little else. It will not likely hold much weight.
You step gingerly onto the bridge, favoring the rope and avoiding the wooden planks as much as possible.
The rope sags under your weight as you begin to make your way across. The wood groans, but holds.
The rushing water a hundred feet below you and the slight swaying of the bridge do not faze you as you continue resolutely.

The bellowing river demands your gaze, and you can't help but meditate on the hundred feet separating you from its churning maw. The wind picks up, setting the bridge to slowly swaying.

Your bowels threaten revolt.
The ropes feel secure beneath your hands, and you move confidently along the structure.
With a crack like a pistol shot, a board breaks beneath [SkillCheck 0]'s tread and he vanishes between the rope supports as the entire bridge shudders.

The bridge bucks like a dinghy upon a churning sea, and you stumble. Your foot falls hard on the next plank, then, with a blood-chilling lurch, passes through it.

You tumble forward.
With a final step onto solid ground, you complete the crossing and find yourself among the thick foliage of the central island.
With a crack like a pistol shot, a board breaks beneath [SkillCheck 0]'s tread and she vanishes between the rope supports as the entire bridge shudders.

Forcing your shuddering muscles to obey, you heave yourself back onto the bridge.

You're still shaking as you get to your feet.
With a final step onto solid ground, you complete the crossing and find yourself among the thick foliage of the central island.
[Grab [SkillCheck 0]'s wrist.]
[Send [Player Animal Companion] to help.]
[Strengthen [SkillCheck 0].]
[Summon a drake.]
You leap into action, securing yourself against the shivering ropes. You thrust your arm down, grasping [SkillCheck 0]'s flailing free hand in your own.
[Specified 5] leaps to help, thrusting an arm down to grasp [SkillCheck 0]'s flailing free hand.
Though your muscles burn, you pull [SkillCheck 0] to safety.
[Leap to catch [SkillCheck 0]'s wrists.]
You leap nimbly forward, your hand intertwining with [SkillCheck 0]'s, averting a plunge into the ravine.
You make your way to the solid ground of the far side of the gorge. The bridge sways violently behind you.
With a heaving grunt, the muscles of your back and arms howling in protest, you manage to drag [SkillCheck 0] to safety.

As one, you and [Player Animal Companion] leap to help. You grab [SkillCheck 0]'s free hand in yours and strain against gravity, as [Player Animal Companion], your clothing between their teeth, pulls as hard as they can, lending you their strength.
Calling on [Player Deity], you infuse [SkillCheck 0]'s muscles with divine essence and extend your hand. With a gasp of effort, [SkillCheck 0] climbs to safety.
Your voice stirs the essence in the air around you, and you feel the spirits rousing to your chant.

...only to be caught up by a summoned drake. With a few sharp flaps of its shadowed wings, it brings [SkillCheck 0] up to rejoin you, setting your shaken companion lightly onto the damp ground. The drake then takes flight, leaving you on the bridge.
You walk the edge of the chasm in either direction, but find no other manner of crossing. The river seems to stretch down to the beach you landed at, separating you from the rest of the island.
With time, [SkillCheck 0] tells you, a bridge could be reinforced with materials provided by the island, but that would require days of dangerous effort.
With time, you could reinforce the bridge from the materials provided by the wilds around you, but that would require days of arduous effort.
[Return the way you came.]

Days of hard labor ensue, as, clinging carefully to the underside of the bridge, you use branches and vines to reinforce it.

Eventually, however, the crossing appears significantly safer.
You step onto the reinforced bridge, and it bears your weight with reassuring stability. You begin the crossing.
You look down to find [SkillCheck 0] dangling from the bridge by a single hand.
Together, the pair of you haul [SkillCheck 0] to safety.
With a heaving grunt, [Specified 5] drags [SkillCheck 0] to safety.
With a straining cry, [Specified 5] manages to drag [SkillCheck 0] to safety.
[Search for [SkillCheck 0].]
[Shout] "[SkillCheck 0]!"
"Not... gone yet..." comes [SkillCheck 0]'s strained response.
You call on the essence around you and channel energy into [SkillCheck 0]'s form, strengthening bone and muscle.
Eyes closed and hand raised, [Specified 0] empowers [SkillCheck 0]'s form, strengthening bone and muscle.
[Specified 1]'s voice stirs the air, and you feel the spirits rousing to the chant.
[SkillCheck 0]'s cries out as her fingers slip free of the bridge. Arms cartwheeling, she plunges towards the water...
[SkillCheck 0]'s yelps desperately as his fingers slip free of the bridge. Arms cartwheeling, he plunges towards the water...
Your fingers grasp tightly to the suspended plank, leaving you dangling far above the winding river.
[Pull yourself up.]
[Call out for help.]
You feel a confident grip on your wrist and under your arm as [Specified 3] comes to your aid.
With a heaving grunt of exertion, you pull yourself back up to your feet.
[Focus your strength.]
You take a few deep breaths, preparing yourself.
The ropes feel secure beneath your hands, and you move confidently along the structure.
With a final step onto solid ground, you complete the crossing and find yourself among the thick foliage of the central island.
Thick, humid jungle gives way before you to empty air. A vast chasm divides you from further progress, descending to a churning white froth of water below.
[Consider the quality of the wood.]
[Consider the integrity of the planks.]
[Consider the construction of the bridge.]
You garner no further insight from the bridge.
You walk the edge of the chasm in either direction, but find no other manner of crossing. The river seems to stretch down to the beach you landed at, separating you from the rest of the island.
With a heaving grunt of exertion, you pull yourself back up to your feet.
